When i installed it on my xperia x8 and try to download data it says ''a problem occured and the download could not be completed successfully...'' Do you kkow what the problem is? Thanks.

@jurasamas
Did you install the Fast & Furious PowerVR or SnapDragon?
I'm guessing you installed the PowerVR one as I got that error when I installed PowerVR.
Okay, uninstall that and install the SnapDragon one and then you won't get that message and you'll be able to download the files and play the game, worked for me.
As simple as that.
Hope I helped :)
